website_summaries.verdict: A good option if you need a towel rack but don't want to drill holes in the walls.
pros: Suction cups will stick to shower walls
cons: Will not hold well unless surface is properly cleaned first

customer_reviews.title: BEST TOWEL HOLDER ~ NO SCREWS ~ SIMPLE!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! This is now my third one purchased - new double sink vanity with wall to wall mirror and no place for a towel holder! I just placed it onto mirror and there it remains until I remove to clean the mirror and reattach. Wish other items I’ve purchased for convenience worked as well!
customer_reviews.author: Constance Stanchak

customer_reviews.title: ... on my tiles and damn it stuck in there like it was glued on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to avoid drilling a hole on my tiles and damn it stuck in there like it was glued on. To remove it, I had to remove the suction lock first and use a spatula because it was holding on the tile amazingly well. Buying a 2nd one if it holds for another month.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ong rffff

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The suction cup would not stick to my wall despite repeated attempts. Tried using the enclosed 3M adhesive disc. and it still wouldn't stick. Tried to very carefully remove the adhesive disc and it took a huge chunk of paint off the wall. Only way I could get this thing to stick was to mount it on glass mirror. Now I will have to find paint that matches the wall of my new apartment. Really disappointed. 😕
customer_reviews.author: BR from SF

customer_reviews.title: Functional and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The towel ring may not be the most attractive thing — it protrudes from the wall quite a bit and has the brand name etched in the center — but after about a week of use, I’m pleased with its functionality. I placed this on our tiled bathroom wall as the house did not have any towel holders near the sinks. It has held on well without any slipping. Keep in mind that this likely only works well on areas where there would be no grout lines under the suction cup. Our tiles are quite large so there is the smooth surface for easy adhesion.
customer_reviews.author: QuietOwl

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE to Suction is very good
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want a hand towel hanger that I had to attach to the wall or one that hangs over the cabinet door. This fits the job perfectly! We hung it on our mirrors and they work absolutely as we would expect them to. Great suction, they don't fall off and they look great. Nice chrome look so it matches our fixtures. UPDATE: it is great if I hang it on the mirror which I do. However, my husband doesn't like it there so he tries to attach it to his cabinet door. It lasts a few hours there and then falls off. So be prepared for that if you don't like it on the glass!
customer_reviews.author: QUIqui

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Not wanting to use our bathroom counter space for hand towel holders, we decided to try this product and were completely satisfied. The suction power is strong and the rings match our other fixtures. We have placed them just off our counter top -- one on the side of a smooth cabinet and the other on the glass separating our walk-in shower. As the instructions say, they will not adhere to rough tile. We would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Triple A

customer_reviews.title: such a great towel hook
customer_reviews.text: i was surprised on how well the suction worked even considering my bathroom tiles arent completely smooth. I applied it and wanted to move it a few inches higher and it was actually kind of a struggle, which is good and means that it'll hold for a long time. highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Austin P.Top Contributor: Drums

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: At first I had some trouble getting it to stick to the tiles in the shower but I think that's because it was a brand newly tiled wall and still had some mortar dust. After I thoroughly cleaned it, the suction worked and it does hold my towel. Matches the chrome shower heads and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Shinder

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps falling off. Nice looking. Ended up using Gorilla glue, which I didn't want to on a piece of furniture. Addendum: found out there is an imperceptable clear disc covering the pad, that is to be removed before using, did not see this in directions. Im sure it would be fine, but you must be aware of this disc covering film. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: Our guest bathroom has wallpaper I was reluctant to screw a towel holder into, so I tried a few different options before stumbling upon this ingenious solution. It's easy to attach to the mirror and looks fabulous with all the other fixtures in the bathroom. The suction is SUPER strong, so be 100% sure of your placement before you attach it to the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for and it will cost you more in the long run.
customer_reviews.text: This piece of garbage ruined the paint on my wall twice. I received a replacement for the first one and as I was about to hang the replacement the original one fell down after less than one week, with the adhesive disk taking off a nice chunk of the wall.
customer_reviews.author: mgrossba

customer_reviews.title: Best product to use on polished porcelain tile
customer_reviews.text: We have a polished porcelain tile on our bathroom walls, and did not want to make holes. Finding these line of BoPai products was the best thing! They are great looking and work so well, great suction system. We use the open hook-type for our toilet paper, and one in the shower (to hold wash cloth/body poof), and then have the hand towel ring.
customer_reviews.author: Love2shop

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2. Followed directions for my bathroom tile and both fell off the wall within a few days. After putting them up and having them fall multi times I just ended up gluing them on the tile.
customer_reviews.author: Michael melchionne

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and durable!
customer_reviews.text: This suction towel holder is powerful! I barely placed it on my subway tiles and it stuck like glue. I was like.... oh crap! I wasn't expecting for it to grab that fast. This is the best thing ever. At least I dont have to worry about damaging any walls.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie M.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: The directions are non-existent, it can’t hold the weight of a simple hand towel and when I try and put it on the wall using the little glass piece they give it doesn’t work at all and just falls.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Peniston

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this brand here which I tried to afix on my tiled bathroom wall, is HORRIBLE. I followed the instructions and made sure both the wall and suction area where VERY clean and yet it keeps falling no matter how many times I put it back up. VERY disappointed that I wasted my money when I should've stuck with previous brands who were more reliable in their ability to properly suction onto the wall. BOOOOOOOO two thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: maia

customer_reviews.title: Trifecta. Inexpensive, nice and it works.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This thing really has good suction. easy to use and reposition with the lever. Its feather light but looks solid. I ordered 2 more. My large bathroom mirrors leave no room for a hand towel rack. This thing on the mirror is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but not for fabricated wood
customer_reviews.text: This is great on my mirror in the bathroom and stays without the additional adhesive that it comes with. I originally wanted to use it on the fabricated wood cabinets in the kitchen but didn’t want to risk the strong adhesive from damaging the wood. It will not stay on the fabricated wood so that’s a bummer but I still found a good use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Elegance at a steal!
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product and felt how lightweight it was, I must admit I was a bit skeptical. But am I pleased with this purchase! Absolutely! Very shinny stainless steel appearance. It is elegant and very reasonable. The suction holds unbelievably firm as long as the lever is locked into place. I definitely recommend! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sherma Leonce

customer_reviews.title: did not stick
customer_reviews.text: on a clean, freshly drywalled wall, it did not stick. Not even for a second. need I say more?
customer_reviews.author: M. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing and just what we needed for our tiny bathroom. We live in a rented apartment with a very small bathroom. The bathroom only has one towel bar and I got tired of fumbling with the hand towel and the bath towels all on one bar. The towel ring was so easy to attach to our tile wall and feels super sturdy in its place. Definitely would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay up
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first. But it continues to fall. So disappointed this didn’t worked out on dry wall. However, it worked when I put it on the mirror cabinet surface.
customer_reviews.author: SmartPurse

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS! WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my apartment bathroom. The walls are smooth but I still used the disc they provided. It seemed straight forward and it worked and suctioned. Easy. 5 minutes later I was in the kitchen and heard a crashing noise. Yup. On the floor (with no weight or towel on it). I tried a few time more before throwing the damn thing away. Just don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes falls off the wall
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and in general stays put. But occasionally I hear a bang and it's fallen off the (tiled) wall. Still, it's our only option for the surface.
customer_reviews.author: SW SF CA

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for the side of the sink next to an all glass shower door. My husband had nowhere to keep his much used hand towel. This has held up for over 2 months now and we are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Collier

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: What an ingenious bathroom towel holder. SO EASY to install and has a brilliant finish to its appearance. Going to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Ed B

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite item in the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite item in the bathroom. It looks classy and modern. The strength of the suction cup is awesome, I even have pull hard the towel by accident and this thing doesnt move, I'm thinking in other possibilities than the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I’m leasing an apartment and I like using the big hand towels for my guests. I find the towel stands not tall enough and occupy counter space. This looks great on my hanging from my bathroom mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Yuna DJOY

customer_reviews.title: Great Suction
customer_reviews.text: This is the second suction towel holder we purchased because the other brand fell off all the time. I'm so pleased this one is great quality and actually stays up!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Knowell

customer_reviews.title: This is AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow I can put up a towel ring without drilling holes?!? This is amazing seriously changed my life. I also bought the shower head holder, it works perfectly and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: R. Chu

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it was part of the original design of my bathroom. The suction to the tile is super strong they also included an adhesive sticker but I didn’t need it. BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: If you skip the 3m tape, turn the "suction" mechanism slowly and very gently
customer_reviews.text: Should have come with instructions. Also i have a similar product from a different company. Same with that one, I skipped the 3m tape and put it right on the smooth mirror. The mechanism "snapped" and now the metal came off of the base. I'm still going to see if it will at least hold the towel. If not, I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: K H

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I wallpapered my small bath and rather than screw into the beautiful paper to put up a towel bar, I put this ring on my shower door. I repositioned it several times, it’s easy to use and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: MKD66

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ring!
customer_reviews.text: Ok this was actually a lot nicer than expected for the price. It grips really really strong and the finish is nice! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MJLV

customer_reviews.title: Definitely sticks and is secure
customer_reviews.text: Definitely sticks well and hard to remove. Holds up well for holding wash towel by the sink.
customer_reviews.author: jengee2

customer_reviews.title: Damages wall!
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a couple but then suddenly fell damaged my wall severely, although it only held a hand towel. Not looking forward to the deduction from my security desposit. Now it won’t hold to the wall at all.
customer_reviews.author: ruby

customer_reviews.title: Works well as intended. Strong suction mount.
customer_reviews.text: The suction mounting a s very strong. The whole item appears to be chrome, but I think it is some type of plastic as it is very light. It definitely is great and works really well for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Mike O

customer_reviews.title: 8 months and the suction is no longer working
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 8 months ago and the suction is no longer working. Such a bummer because it was so great up until now. The whole thing has also fallen off the wall once now too. It's basically shot now after almost exactly 8 months. Not worth it in my opinion. Wouldn't really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow it sticks!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow this sticks, with just a touch against a clean smooth surface. It's easy to remove by using a card and breaking the suction. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction cup, loose ring
customer_reviews.text: The suction is strong, and doesn't seem like it'll really budge. I've pulled on it and it stays on the glass door that it is on. I give it a 4-star because the ring is loose so if you pull off a towel, the bottom of the ring hits the wall pretty hard. I had to put a clear adhesive bumper to protect the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Erika M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and while it is plastic it is a ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how strong this is. Works great, and while it is plastic it is a great fake!
customer_reviews.author: HBLC

customer_reviews.title: Suction power needs enhancement!
customer_reviews.text: The product seems decent enough however the suction power is useless. Fell off within minutes of putting on the wall. Had to use a different type of adhesive for it to stay.
customer_reviews.author: Liem Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Having tried suction type products in the past, I ...
customer_reviews.text: Having tried suction type products in the past, I was concerned about how well it would cling to a fiberglass shower. This product has exceeded my expectations. Still a little light weight for my taste but, has held up for the past month that I.habe been using it
customer_reviews.author: Mark F. Merwath Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay
customer_reviews.text: Won't stay up on the wall at all.. cleaned the tile and just keeps falling down.. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Julli

customer_reviews.title: ... and i dont have to drill holes in my nice tile
customer_reviews.text: these things are a little pricey but working well so far and i dont have to drill holes in my nice tile
customer_reviews.author: M. Marc

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Won’t stuck no matter what. It worked for a couple of hours and after that, it just keeps falling!!!
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and stays put. Only suggestion would be more finishes to chose from
customer_reviews.author: walter hammock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this towel ring! The suction cup holds very, very well. Have had the ring mounted on my shower door now for about 6 months, and have had no issues whatsoever....and it is a quality look and feel. Very stylish in our master bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalPrime

customer_reviews.title: Good for Glass/Mirror but Nothing Else
customer_reviews.text: Sticks to a mirror or glass very well but doesn’t work and isn’t safe for just about ANY other surface. Ruined my bathroom door. Now instead of a tenant-safe towel rack I have to scrape and re-paint my door!
customer_reviews.author: ALICAL

customer_reviews.title: Towel Ring
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Looks nice and it's so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald M.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give a complete review because the durability issue takes time. I have had the product for only a month. It seems to be doing the job and I am satisfied ... so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Hayase

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SUCTION IS STRONG JUST BY ITSELF , WOULD DEF BUY AGAIN AND RECCOMEND TO FRIENDS
customer_reviews.author: mmm1217

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Did exactly what it’s supposed to do, stick on the wal no drill. I have tiles and it stuck, suction is strong !! Very easy to put on but a little more effort required to take off which is a good thing since you don’t want it falling off easily. Chrome detail looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: In a newly built house, and somehow hand towel rings were not put in. Didn't want to drill holes, so ordered this. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: skyemeralds

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it in a camper and definitely needed the 3M sticker to make it stay on the wall, but easy to use. We'll see how it sticks when the temp drops.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Actually stays stuck! wow!
customer_reviews.text: This thing actually sticks to the wall unlike a ton of other brands I've tried. I am glad I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay on wall when hand towel put on it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: I appreciate the ease of installing this product and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the ease of installing this product and the look of it. It seems to be holding to the glass enclosure very well.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This did not budge off my mirror at all when placed. It’s very easy to remove and reinstall. I love it. Nice look too. Goes with the chrome in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: surprising quality for a suction mount holder
customer_reviews.text: looks and works great so far. lets hope it holds up
customer_reviews.author: sneakyright

customer_reviews.title: This works great! Doesn't look as bulky as I thought it ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great! Doesn't look as bulky as I thought it would. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S.

customer_reviews.title: Suction Power
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 3 of these rings. The design is nice and they look good. However, 2 of the rings would not stay suctioned to the tile wall.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and seems to have very strong suction
customer_reviews.text: I item was very easy to install and the suction seems to be very strong, even without fully engaging the suction cup it stay up without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: aluna12

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Very easy to install on my bathroom wall, which is tiled. Has not fallen off, like other reviews indicate. I keep a hand towel on it, which I use multiple times each day, and product seems very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Good consept but doesnt stay
customer_reviews.text: Was a great consept but it wouldnt even hold a dry washcloth over night.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Suction is very strong if you press ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Suction is very strong if you press down towards the wall very hard and then lock it shut. Will fall down if you do it lightly and then lock it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Zavala

customer_reviews.title: No instructions. Didn't hold to smooth tile wall.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived wrapped in plain plastic with NO Instructions or even identifying label. Did not hold on smooth tile wall. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: gpK

customer_reviews.title: As advertised! Easy to install and hasn't failed yet.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product. It adheres easily to our glass door, and has yet to fall off or move after 2 weeks. Easy to install and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Eng

customer_reviews.title: Fell off wall and took paint with it!
customer_reviews.text: Total piece of junk. Did not come with instructions. This fell off my wall and took the paint with it the day after I put it up. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Vanley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: It worked very nicely for about one month, and then it started falling off. I tried different ways to make the suction work, but it doesn't last. It fell down again this morning, and I had it. The suction doesn't last!
customer_reviews.author: mom4

customer_reviews.title: No drilling into tile required.
customer_reviews.text: Finally a towel rack with a suction that hold a towel and stays attached to the tile.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Vogle

customer_reviews.title: Although I was happy with the look and finish of the towel ring
customer_reviews.text: Although I was happy with the look and finish of the towel ring, I was disappointed that I couldn’t put it on the wall, I had to put it on the tile. It arrived in an opened bag with no paperwork such as instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Poohbear

customer_reviews.title: It adheres great
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased when this arrived. This looks high quality. We attached it to the shower- no problem & hung 2 washcloths. Exactly as desired.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel supri

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: There was no instructions and it won’t stay on the flat wall. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Rachel  Richards

customer_reviews.title: as other reviews stated felt like it was holding before even completing
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised, mounted to bath mirror, as other reviews stated felt like it was holding before even completing installation
customer_reviews.author: Janet B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good (2 weeks later), hold really well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great and looks very elegant
customer_reviews.text: Seals tightly, works great and looks very elegant. I've used one for the last 5 years but I'm moving out of my place and my landlady wants it back. Liked it so much that I bought this one for the new place. Highly recommend the BOPai towel ring.
customer_reviews.author: BC1

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use! Did the job as I expected! 👍😄
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Coelho

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!! - Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: The suction is great and it looks nice! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for appartments or people not trying to ruin a wall for an extra spot.
customer_reviews.author: VINCENT

customer_reviews.title: I’ll buy it again when I need it!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, two way to put on the different material wall, easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Yu

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t want to put holes in tile then this is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for our pool bathroom. Suctions is crazy strong!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Lahad

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: This stayed up for like 2 months, then all of a sudden the vacuum suction cup stopped holding up. Such a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Abrianna Harkness

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Suction is terrible. Literally falls off every 5 minutes. Completely unsuable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still on 2 months later
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been 2 months and it's worked well. Knock on wood.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Betancourt-Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! Perfect solution for a second towel ring in our master bath - no drilling, absolutely stays put and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Super strong
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, just wish the plastic lever to secure it was a bit smaller for looks.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: I have no Directions for install or the 3M disc also not included
customer_reviews.text: Would like to be able to install but do not have any directions and the 3M disc was not included.
customer_reviews.author: ZeeNYC

customer_reviews.title: Strong and easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on tile wall for bathroom hand towel.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stick in my bathroom, really bad product, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Mcder

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, looks beautiful. It feels hollow and sounds “plastic” when you first touch it, but works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ilda

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made. It was not a strong suction ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. It was not a strong suction as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: susan mcarthur

customer_reviews.title: This item is of very poor quality and does not stick to the wall as ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is of very poor quality and does not stick to the wall as advised. Of course I cleaned the wall before I applied it and I waited for the water to dry which doesn't take long. But within 20 minutes I was in another room and her to crash. I walked to the bathroom to find that it a had fallen. No matter what I did I could not get it to stick. Eventually I bought double-sided super tape and just use that to stick it to the wall. That lasted a week. You basically just need to buy ones that screw into the wall and don't take a shortcut like I did. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Crawford

customer_reviews.title: works when it wants to
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for my 2 bathrooms. One is on a painted wall, stuck on immediately and has been there for 3 weeks, no disk or anything. The other is on the disk it came with, and every few days, it falls down. Makes no sense, since the other one stays on a plain wall and the this one won't stay on it's own disk!! Might try a different disk, as my towel rack made by the same company has no problem staying up with the disks with a wet towel on it.
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cause of the reviews I read seemed to be the best choice and they were! We rented a condo for the winter that had NO towel bars. Had 3 bathrooms and not a single towel bar but had large mirrors . I put them on the mirrors and they worked wonderful. I even pulled on them from time to time to see if they moved or would pop off. They stayed on perfectly for the whole 3 months. And they are easy to remove and install. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: boatlady

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, but cheap feel
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this towel ring, but it feels like cheap plastic and rattles noisily when in use. The thin plastic, adhesive disc that came with the ring to mount on painted surfaces pulled right off the wall overnight. I was able to use a different disc to install it in a different spot.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: A great option
customer_reviews.text: In my new place the placement of the towel racks in not convenient for drying your hands after washing, so I bought this. It was exactly what I needed. The suction power is insane. Once i settled on a place to put this, it's not going anywhere. The style is nice, and quality of materials is really good. Now I don't have to drip my way across the bathroom to dry my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, easy install but would not stick.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to install, but would not stay on wall. Wall is smooth, but not sure because the paint has a gloss. Would stay strong for about 20 minutes and fall. Used the circular disk same result. Too bad because it looked really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very solid!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little towel holder and solution. I had no place to install a towel holder and this one works well on my shower glass. It’s a little lightweight but then I guess it needs to be due to being a suction holder.
customer_reviews.author: SS in Chas

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: These things have too good a suction. I lightly placed one against the tile to see how it would look and I needed to cram a spoon under it to pry it off! Looks like it could hold a heavy towel if needed. Very easy to install and appears good quality. Way easier than drilling a hole. Don’t really notice the brand name on the front but it can’t be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BOPai Drill Free Powerful Vacuum Suction Cup Towel Ring Shower Washcloth Hand Towel Round Holder
product_meta.description:
Size:Suction Towel RingSave Wall & Save Time - BOPai Vacuum Suction Cup Towel Ring
Drill Free,Install Quickly,BOPai Suction Cup Made by High Quality Silicone that Strong Scalability with Good Air Tightness.
Now You Can Timely Intall Your Towel Ring and Relocate It to Anywhere if Need !

【Instructions】:
1.Ensure the surface is flat,smooth undamped and no concave convex First.Clean and dry the position and suction cup
2.Applying a small amount of moisture to the suction cup
3.Press the holder,push out the air
4.Slide the suction lever downwards
Others non-smooth surface such as emulsioni paint, dumb smooth ceramic tile.should use the Stick disc first which we have provided in package.
Just use it to overcome non-smooth walls.stick disc to the non-smooth surface first .then attach the suction cup on the disc.

Package Included:
1*BOPai Suction Cup Towel Ring
1* Stick disc
feature_bullets: REDEFINE THE CONVENIENT:BOPai Suction towel ring without having to drill and screws in the tile.Fast install and Convenient to relocat that placed your towel to anywhere you need.

STRONG SUCTION ABILITY:This suction cup made by high quality silicone material that strong scalability with good air tightness.3-inches large Suction cup can bear 7.5 Pounds maximum.So it's easy to holder a towel sturdy even full of water
PREMIUM CHROME FINISH:ABS plastic material,5 layer coating material for Contemporary shiny chrome finish.Light weight but heavy duty engineering grade plastic.
Measurement:Outside diameter 6¾ inches.Inside diameter 5¾ inches.The ring itself (tubing) is ½ inches.Normal distance from the wall 2inch.Tubing can rotate if you need.

Use Introduction:Suction cup works on completed smooth surface(no rough concave convex).such as glass, stainless steel or mirror, ceramic tile, etc.and to overcome others non-smooth surface.we provided adhesive disc together.such as grout lines.rough tile.emulsioni paint.Just use disc first to overcome them.
